Description:
Ideal development site 889sqm STCA
Situated on an enormous 889 square metre allotments is this great 5-bedroom 2-bathroom family home perfect for the now and ideal for your future plans STCA and all relevant authorities.
- Featuring 2 separate living areas. Delightful bay windows at the front & a wood heater in the lounge plus an attractive brick feature wall.
- With functional kitchen opening to a meals area on one side & a spacious family room on the other.
- Outside there is a huge pergola/entertainment area & drive through access to the garage/workshop & to top it off there is a swimming pool.
Located within close proximity of the Cranbourne Home Maker Centre which includes Bunnings & a short drive to your choice of Schools plus Monash Freeway is within close reach.
Insights: 35 Clairmont Avenue, Cranbourne VIC 3977 was last sold in 2017 and 15 other 5 bedroom house in Cranbourne have recently been sold.

Description:
3 LIVING AREAS, FEELS BRAND NEW!
Set in the exclusive Carlisle Park estate within walking distance to Cranbourne Carlisle Primary & only moments to Springhill shops, childcare & more, this immaculate & renovated home on 630sqm is not to be missed. Suiting families, the home features 3 bedrooms plus study/4th bed, 3 living areas including formal lounge, living & rumpus, master with WIR & ensuite, spacious kitchen with stainless appliances, separate dining area, and ducted heating & evaporative cooling for your comfort. The home has been recently updated with fresh paint, carpets & blinds. Outside you have rear access to the huge backyard, and a deck perfect for entertaining this summer. With nothing to spend, it is ready to move into NOW, contact Daniel today!

Description:
Location = Perfect!
Situated in a quiet and friendly cul-de-sac is this outstanding value for money, property in this highly sought-after location don't last long! Some key features on offer include:
- Three Bedrooms
- Ensuite and Walk-in robe to master
- Generous size living room
- Separate dining area
- Spacious kitchen:
- Stainless Steel appliances
- Dishwasher
- Overhead cupboards
- Large pantry
- Gas ducted heating
- Split system cooling
- Double lock up garage
- Internal access from garage
This home offers remarkable value and its location is supreme with its easy walk to SpringHill shops with its huge array of speciality shops, Carlisle Park kindergarten, Carlisle Primary School plus Casey Central just a short drive away! Investors or first home buyers this home will be sure to impress and your inspection is highly recommended!
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our Business Development Associate Jami McDonald has appraised this property at $350 - $360 p/w ($1521-$1564pcm) for more details about leasing contact Jami on 9705 3000 today.

Description:
Think big
Looking for a home with character, a home with big land and a home with great location? Look no further. Allow us to introduce 3 O'Tooles Road, Cranbourne. Situated only minutes' drive to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, St. Peter's College, Cranbourne Turf Club and much more…
Property Features:
- Master bedroom with WIR and ensuite with two way access
- 3 other spacious bedrooms
- Multiple skylights offering extra natural light
- Massive sunken lounge & wood fire place
- Large kitchen with plenty of cupboard space
- Stainless steel appliances & dishwasher
- Massive garden shed plus great sized backyards
- 645m2 approx. land
This wonderful property is full of opportunities whether you're looking for a great family home or after a big block. Don't miss out, enquire today with Naval Singh on 0401 489 262 or Irene Baselyous on 0450 014 070

Description:
EX-DISPLAY HOME ON 600+ BLOCK!
This stunning former-display home offers a style of living where you can easily come together with family and friends, or separate yourself from activity when you want your own private retreat.
Situated on a rare and generous 613sqm block(approx) & Comprising 3 extra-large robed bedrooms, (master with ensuite and WIR), 3+ entertainment areas and double remote controlled garage, this lovely home will suit the whole family + more!
The first formal living room is separate from the other entertainment areas further back, making it perfect for watching a movie, playing video games or reading a quiet book in privacy. The main hallway upon entry also allows you to section off the three bedrooms from the main family, kitchen and meals area should you wish. Outside you will be welcomed by a decked & covered alfresco with BBQ area, plus 2 water features (one at front, one at back)and a and low maintenance garden. The property is beautifully finished off with evaporative cooling, ducted heating, Alarm system and a double remote controlled garage with internal access.
Call today to secure this lovely family home.

Description:
Generous Family Residence - Currently Leased Til Feb 2018
This attractive 4 bedroom family home possesses lovely street appeal and is located in the sought after Carlisle Park estate within easy walking distance to parks, shopping centres and local primary school is just across the road. Terraced landscaped gardens enhance the street appeal of this value packed property which features many quality appointments and an enviable floor plan. Includes generous formal & informal living areas, extensive floating timber floors, beautiful well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, main bedroom with huge ensuite & spa and lock up garage with rear yard access. Other appointments include ducted central heating and split system air conditioning for year round comfort.
This well located value packed property is keenly priced and will sell fast! Call Jess now for further details.

SOLD AT AUCTION!
CRANBOURNE TOURISM & RACING GATEWAY DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITY
Exciting opportunity for the astute buyer to take advantage of this rare find. A substantial house set on approximately 1043sqm of land with loads of potential for development subject to council approval.
* Activity Centre Zone suitable for residential or commercial multi level development (STCA)
* Potential multi townhouse site, medical centre, commercial suites, hotel, childcare centre and veterinary centre (STCA)
* Huge block approximately measuring 1043sqm with a wide frontage of 41.40m and 25.15m in depth
* Double storey brick house featuring 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, multiple living areas, double garage and workshop
* Located in the heart of Cranbourne's CBD and surrounded by medical centres, monash health day hospital and nearby High Street
* Gateway location to Cranbourne Race Course

Description:
A RARE OPPORTUNITY
Act quickly to secure this great home suiting first home buyers or investors. Pieces of real estate like this property don't come on the market often. Set on a huge 664sqm block this property would be a secure investment the potential to subdivide (STCA) or a buyer looking for extra space for storage of boats, caravans and trailers.
Newly renovated house offers 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, kitchen overlooking meals area and light and bright lounge room complete with great location. Long drive way with rear access will make parking and storing vehicles a breeze. There is also the added extra of a double garage at the rear of the property. Big pergola for all year entertainment and beautiful low maintenance garden with garden shed
The location is second to none within walking distance to train station, parklands, shopping facilities, both primary and secondary schools and medical facilities. The area provides easy access to main arterial roads including the Monash Freeway and East Link and is very popular with families and investors.
This property will not last long! Please contact Harry on 0413 585 759 direct to arrange an inspection.

Description:
**UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT**
CRANBOURNE: Only app. 2 years young and perfectly designed for a low maintenance lifestyle this property is nestled in a master planned estate in a secure location on the edge of the Amstel Golf Club.
Ideally suited to empty nesters, first home buyers looking to capitalise on stamp duty savings and investors looking to take advantage of the instant rental return courtesy of the existing tenant.
Impeccably maintained and in as new condition there's an instantly appealing modern facade and neat front gardens that are pleasing to the eye.
Inside, the central hallway leads you to the open plan lounge/dining room with a sunny Western aspect and the stone topped kitchen with all stainless-steel appliances. There are 2 robed bedrooms, the master complete with a walk-in wardrobe and a full ensuite, bedroom 2 has easy access to the family bathroom.
Ducted heating together with a split system air conditioner provide year round comfort, whilst outside you will find a single remote garage with internal access plus a backyard with a paved patio providing a great place to relax or entertain!
The position is second to none within moments to train stations, public/private schooling, child care facilities and both the Camms Road and Sandhurst shopping centres. Minutes to the Cranbourne town centre and major roads enroute to Frankston and Dandenong!
This gem offers fantastic value for money and is bound to walk out the door. Call before its SELLING, SELLING, SOLD!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW - PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS!

Description:
It's deceiving, it's charming, it's perfect
1st home buyers, developers come and take a look at this one! Behind this innocent looking façade hides the promise of loads of potential and a whole lot of fun for the family in the meantime.
This three bedroom home has been cleverly renovated to provide the best of indoor and outdoor family entertainment. A cosy lounge with a glowing wood fire, split system and timber flooring greets you when entering the property and the fresh and renovated kitchen complete with dishwasher overlooks a spacious family room. Two bedrooms have built-in robes and the family bathroom and laundry have also been recently renovated.
The undercover outdoor entertaining area sets the scene for many afternoons and evenings with friends and family and is adjoining a large rumpus/games room with a separate room. This area would be perfect for a home office/business such as a treatment room for a masseuse, beauty therapist or could even be used as a yoga or meditation studio. The list is endless!
Extra features include a tandem carport, security cameras and sensor lights and a spacious rear yard.
A possible future two unit development site (STCA) and in a prime position within walking distance to Cranbourne West Primary School, ten minute walk to Cranbourne Railway Station and only minutes to the heart of Cranbourne and Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre.

Description:
Central Cranbourne Location on 625m Of Land!
Situated in an ideal location, this much-loved family home in central Cranbourne in now up for grabs.
Comprising of 3 bedrooms all equipped by built in robes, split central bathroom with full bath and shower, spacious sun-filled living/meals area with hardwood flooring adjourning the fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel dishwasher and gas cook top, plenty of bench space and ample cupboards to store all your cooking essentials. Laundry and linen cupboard which both offers plenty of room.
Relax in your own spacious backyard, which features a fully paved covered terrace offering the chance to double your entertaining space, and a large in ground swimming pool which will be ready for summer after some TLC and repair.
Additional features on offer:
* Split system heating/cooling
* Tiled wet areas
* Tandem Garage and carport
Conveniently located within minutes of local amenities including the train station, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, schools, supermarkets and easy access to freeways including South Gippsland Hwy. This home offers you a fantastic opportunity so be sure to act quick before it goes!

Description:
OPPORTUNITY FOR THOSE FOCUSED ON LOCATION!
CRANBOURNE CENTRAL: A Great home in a central location, makes this property a very appealing proposition! Set on a large block of 604m2 approx. nestled in a blue-chip location surrounded by all the town centre's local amenities, A moments stroll to Lurline Street shops & with Cranbourne Park Shopping centre only a brisk walk away allowing you easy access to an array of shopping outlets and cafes/restaurants.
This charming home, In the heart of Cranbourne, consists of a warm mix of colours and floating timber floor boards, that makes you feel instantly at home. With 3 great size bedrooms with built in robes, all are in close proximity to the family bath room with separate bath and shower facilities.
Separate kitchen with stainless steel oven and plenty of cupboard space with adjoining meals area overlooking the outdoor entertaining area. A generous L shaped lounge room, with the cooler nights this winter its the perfect place to keep warm and enjoy a night in.
Fantastic undercover outdoor entertaining area, the ideal place to entertain friends and family or to unwind and relax after a hard days work. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, secure off-road parking with a fenced front yard, large and spacious back yard and so much more.
If you believe in the age-old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location, then you won't be disappointed!
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought-after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within walking distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Centro, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
Great family home in Carlisle Park Estate
If you are an investor, first home buyer or looking to downsize, this well presented house is perfect for you!
Featuring:
- Master bedroom with walk in robe and full ensuite.
- Built in robes to 2 other bedrooms.
- Formal lounge room.
- Separate family/dining room.
- Gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
- Reverse cycle split system in lounge room.
- Ceiling fan in all the bedrooms.
- 10,000 litres of water tank.
- 7 KW solar panels.
- Double garage with internal access.
Situated in ever popular "Carlisle Park Estate" only 40 minutes to Melbourne CBD with an easy access to Western Port Freeway and Monash Freeway. Close to Cranbourne Carlisle Primary School, Courtenay Gardens Primary School, Springhill Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Homemaker Centre.
Photo ID required for access at inspections.

Description:
Ready Made Investment
An outstanding opportunity presents itself with this modern 4 bedroom family home, located close to all services including schools, shops and public transport. Featuring a formal lounge, spacious open plan kitchen and family room with meals area, a full ensuite and walk -in robe to the master suite, and built in robes to remaining bedrooms. The neutral colour scheme and free flowing layout will widely appeal, whilst a spacious rear yard provides room and potential for additions such as a pergola, pool or further landscaping. Currently occupied by secure long-term tenants, the property offers an attractive rental return, along with strong capital growth. The property also makes a perfect first home. With house prices rising, NOW is the time to buy into the property market and be in by Christmas. Extra comforts such as dishwasher, remote double garage and ducted heating and cooling complete the package.
